analysis.description:
Reentrancy in FlowerAuction.bidOnBreedingAuction (/unique_chucks/21/0x7982a79ee90eb3682dcee66e47ba79c1cba44062.sol#863-883):
	External calls:
	- currentPrice = breedingAuction.getCurrentPrice(_sireId) (/unique_chucks/21/0x7982a79ee90eb3682dcee66e47ba79c1cba44062.sol#870-872)
	- breedingAuction.bid.value(msg.value - autoBirthFee)(_sireId,msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/21/0x7982a79ee90eb3682dcee66e47ba79c1cba44062.sol#877-879)
	- _born(uint32(_matronId),uint32(_sireId)) (/unique_chucks/21/0x7982a79ee90eb3682dcee66e47ba79c1cba44062.sol#879)
	External calls sending eth:
	- breedingAuction.bid.value(msg.value - autoBirthFee)(_sireId,msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/21/0x7982a79ee90eb3682dcee66e47ba79c1cba44062.sol#877-879)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- flowerIndexToOwner (/unique_chucks/21/0x7982a79ee90eb3682dcee66e47ba79c1cba44062.sol#879)
	- flowers (/unique_chucks/21/0x7982a79ee90eb3682dcee66e47ba79c1cba44062.sol#879)

SaleClockAuction.bid (/unique_chucks/21/0x7982a79ee90eb3682dcee66e47ba79c1cba44062.sol#659-674) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- seller == address(gen0SellerAddress)

SaleClockAuction.bid (/unique_chucks/21/0x7982a79ee90eb3682dcee66e47ba79c1cba44062.sol#659-674) uses a dangerous strict equality:

SaleClockAuction.bidGift (/unique_chucks/21/0x7982a79ee90eb3682dcee66e47ba79c1cba44062.sol#674-696) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- seller == address(gen0SellerAddress)
